name: Acing Algebra: The Domain and Range Game!
name_original: Acing Algebra: The Domain and Range Game!
description:
A game made in about four days for my algebra class. Technically, it's my first complete game! I hope it helps out my classmates if they decide to play it.

Please keep in mind that this game is more of a review than a teaching tool, as it is made for my class.
